contentHeight.description: tabs content height required for pca

customTabEnabled.description: boolean value required to show to custom content as default selected

customTabSelected.description: boolean value required to show to custom tab as default selected

defaultTab.description: string value as info, actions and navigation to show which tab as default selected

imageShape.description: image shape value as round, square for pca

showActionsTab.description: bololean value to set whether want to show action tab for pca

showInformationTab.description: bololean value to set whether want to show information tab for pca

showNavigationTab.description: bololean value to set whether want to show navigation tab for pca

showHeader.description: boolean value to set whether want to show header for pca

initials.description: instead of image we would display the initials

customContentEnabled.description: boolean value to set whether to show custom content with out any tab for pca
